title: Actsafe OHS Navigator API Schema (STAR System Integration)
description: The expected data structure for a list of OHS training requirements used by the React component. This data must be provided as a single list/array where each item represents a required training course.

id.description: Unique identifier for the course (e.g., Actsafe course ID).

name.description: The full name of the training course (e.g., 'Motion Picture Safety Awareness').

link.description: The direct URL to the course page on actsafe.ca for registration/details.

industry_id.description: The industry key this training applies to ('mp' for Motion Picture, 'pa' for Performing Arts, 'le' for Live Events).

role_name.description: The exact job role name this training applies to (must match the keys in the component's internal logic, e.g., 'Head of Department / Supervisor').
